flawed_nl_solution:
There are 60 goldfish because 15 / 0.25 = <<15/0.25=60>>60
57% of the fish are below the surface because 100 - 25 = <<100-25=57>>57
There are 45 goldfish below the surface because 60 x 0.75 = <<60*0.75=45>>45
#### 45

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 75, not 57. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
